original_text: With his wife’s full knowledge he kept back part of the money for himself, but brought the rest and put it at the apostles’ feet.
korean_text: 그 값에서 얼마를 감추매 그 아내도 알더라 얼마만 가져다가 사도들의 발 앞에 두니

sentences.original_text: he kept back part of the money for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 돈의 일부를 자신을 위해 감추었고

sentences.original_text: and put it at the apostles' feet
